subtitle: another one of the challenges of modern
times
is the illusion that you can press a
button
you can get anything in a moment that we
can acquire things
and then own them the truth is
that all the real things that truly
matter in life
you cannot get with the press of a
button you have to respect
two elements that they emerge
if you do the right steps and number two
that there's a process
think of a flower growing in a garden
can you pull a flower out of its
roots when it's just beginning to bud
and sprout
no you have to wait you have to be
patient
you water it you weed
you nurture you nourish
and the flower will emerge so you need
to be patient and allow the process
you can help the process along
but you cannot replace the process and
it needs to emerge
the same thing is with love people say i
want to find love in my life
so we sometimes confuse love with a
commodity
and just like you can go to department
store or grocery store bakery and buy
a product a loaf of bread where can i
buy love
not quite buy it maybe with money some
people think they can even buy it with
money
but how do i how do i acquire this
commodity
love emerges and requires a process
you meet somebody you get to know each
other
you nurture each other just like the
watering of the flower and then
things begin to emerge respect the
process
and allow things to emerge we've become
impatient in our lives
because so many things we just as i said
press a button
you order it within an hour it's at your
door
and i believe a lot of the
demoralization
and the disorientation of our time is
because things were so comfortable
we took them for granted and now it's
not that simple
i mean we're still not in the middle
ages
things are going quite well online
business is booming
but still even a little disruption i
can't go to my favorite restaurant or
try a new one i can't entertain myself i
can't travel
school summer plans
but think of it maybe it's a wake-up
call
to let us ponder
on emergence of things on the process
and that you cannot control it and you
can't own it
allow yourself to embrace that do what
you need to do
plant the seeds water nurture
and you'll be surprised how the results
emerge
as you respect the process
you
